api/conversation-manager.title: ConversationManager API
api/conversation-manager.description: The ConversationManager is the central service for managing conversation state and RunState persistence across channels using canonical subject IDs.

api/threading-service.title: ThreadingService API
api/threading-service.description: The ThreadingService manages the execution flow of agent conversations, including streaming, interruptions, and approval workflows.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: The Twilio OpenAI Agents SDK Starter is built on a modular, scalable architecture that enables sophisticated conversational AI experiences across multiple channels.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: Welcome to the Twilio OpenAI Agents SDK Starter! This comprehensive platform enables you to build sophisticated conversational AI agents that integrate seamlessly with Twilio's communication channels.

guides/adding-a-channel.title: Adding a Channel
guides/adding-a-channel.description: Channels connect your AI agents to different communication platforms. This guide shows how to create a custom channel adapter to integrate with new platforms.

guides/creating-an-agent.title: Creating an Agent
guides/creating-an-agent.description: Agents in this system are specialized AI assistants that handle specific types of customer inquiries. This guide shows you how to create a new agent from scratch.

guides/writing-a-tool.title: Writing a Tool
guides/writing-a-tool.description: Tools are the primary way for AI agents to interact with external systems and perform actions on behalf of customers. This guide walks you through creating a custom tool from scratch.
